text: Otoineppu Station's platform, 2009 is a railway station located in Otoineppu, Nakagawa District (Teshio), Hokkaidō prefecture, and is operated by the Hokkaido Railway Company. ==Lines Serviced== *Hokkaido Railway Company :*Sōya Main Line ==Adjacent stations== ==External links== *Ekikara Time Table - JR Otoineppu Station Category:Railway stations in Hokkaido Prefecture Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1912
title: Otoineppu Station
